javascript:(()%3D%3E%7B(function()%7Bif(document.getElementById(%22c1t-fab%22))%7Bvar%20n%3Ddocument.getElementById(%22c1t-overlay%22)%3Bn%26%26n.classList.add(%22open%22)%3Breturn%7Dvar%20e%3Dwindow.location.hostname%2Co%3Dwindow.location.pathname%2Ci%3De.includes(%22capitaloneshopping%22)%26%26o.startsWith(%22%2Faccount-settings%2Fshopping-trips%22)%2Cs%3De.includes(%22capitaloneoffers%22)%26%26o.startsWith(%22%2Fc1-offers%2Fshopping-trips%22)%3Bif(!i%26%26!s)%7Balert(%60Please%20run%20this%20on%20the%20Shopping%20Trips%20page%3A%0A%0Acapitaloneshopping.com%2Faccount-settings%2Fshopping-trips%0Aor%0Acapitaloneoffers.com%2Fc1-offers%2Fshopping-trips%60)%3Breturn%7Dvar%20t%3Ddocument.createElement(%22script%22)%3Bt.src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwillblaschko.github.io%2Fcapital-one-shopping-and-offers-tracker%2Fbookmarklet-full.js%22%2Ct.onerror%3Dfunction()%7Balert(%22Failed%20to%20load%20tracker%20script.%20Check%20your%20internet%20connection.%22)%7D%2Cdocument.body.appendChild(t)%7D)()%3B%7D)()%3B%0A
